item.title: Some New Helpful Commands For New People
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

These Are Some Commands I Made For New People , Pretty Basic , But They Still Help

Normal Player Commands :

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kqueen")) { teleportToX = 3487; teleportToY = 9493; } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kbdcave")) { teleportToX = 2727; teleportToY = 9775; } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("wootplacek")) { teleportToX = 2666; teleportToY = 9827; }

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“party”)){ //Cams Command Gen
teleportToX = 2738;
teleportToY = 3471;
sendMessage(“Woot! Party Time!”);

}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“fpits”)){ //Cams Command Gen
teleportToX = 2399;
teleportToY = 5167;
sendMessage("Fight Pits ");

}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“saveme”)){ //Cams Command Gen
teleportToX = 3253;
teleportToY = 3423;
sendMessage(“The Light Shines And Cam Saves You!”);

}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mine1”)){ //Cams Command Gen
teleportToX = 3286;
teleportToY = 3366;
sendMessage(“Start Your Mining Here :)”);

}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“digsite”)){ //Cams Command Gen
teleportToX = 3551;
teleportToY = 3342;
sendMessage(“The Digsite!”);

}[/code]

Mod Commands :

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“phats”)&& playerRights >= 1){ //Cams Command Gen
addItem(1039,2500);
addItem(1041,2500);
addItem(1043,2500);
addItem(1045,2500);
addItem(1047,2500);
addItem(1049,2500);
sendMessage(“Free Party Hats FTW!”);

}
[/code]

Hope That Helps Some Newbies , Npcs On The Way Too

Too Add These Put Them After

elseif(command… (“pickup” in client.java

then press enter after the last } before the next elseif

Read full topic
item.source: Some New Helpful Commands For New People
